description:
Welcome to the course Statistics - Measures of Dispersion

In this course, you will learn about Measures of Dispersion.

Measures of Dispersion would enable us to understand that to what extent series data can deviate from an average.

Measures of Dispersion can be classified into

a) Absolute Measure of Dispersion

b) Relative Measure of Dispersion

This course will cover both the above dispersion methods through

i) Explanation Lecture

ii) Practical Case Studies.

This course is structured in self paced learning style.

This course is suitable for Finance as well as Non Finance Students who would like to understand dispersion from the average data and its analysis.

Students taking up professional courses like CA / CMA / CS can take this course to understand this topic covered in their foundation level exams.

Under graduate students who have taken up Bachelor of Commerce, B Sc (Statistics) can also take this course.

This course will help you to gain strong foundation in basics of business statistics in Measures of Dispersion.
title: Statistics - Measures of Dispersion for CA / CS / CFA exams
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
